channel.title: How would i do this
channel.description:
how would i make it so when you have
pure ess in your invy and you runecraft you get runes but when u dont you get a messege saying pure esseence needed
im not sure how i would do it so this happens when i runecraft i know how 2 make items change from using them i.e telecrystals
im just no certain on how i would make it so when u runecraft it takes the ess and gives you the runes and xp[br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2007, 02:56:35 PM[/size][hr]any ideaS?
